title: Examples
text: create aggrid table, use aggrid() data frame matrix.

title: Examples
text: column width adjustment, can use ag_col_def() ag_col_width().

title: Examples
text: don’t want particular column included auto resize, can use size_to_fit(). example, want first column remain fixed width, columns fill width table.

title: Examples
text: Auto width fit contents cells column. options please see https://www.ag-grid.com/javascript-data-grid/column-properties.

title: Examples
text: aggrid() default set columns filter, automatically identify data type select filter mode. want change default behavior, please use ag_col_filter(). options please see https://www.ag-grid.com/javascript-data-grid/filter-text/.

title: Examples
text: default, aggrid() remove colnames dots, use ag_col_header() can custom colnames. code bad, can use ag_col_defs() vectorization. menuTabs parameter default c('filterMenuTab','generalMenuTab','columnsMenuTab'), want filter menuTab, can:
code: aggrid(iris) |>    ag_col_header(Sepal.Length,headerName = c("Sepal.Length")) |>    ag_col_header(Sepal.Width,headerName = c("Sepal.Width")) aggrid(iris) |>    ag_col_defs(columns = everything(),headerName = names(iris)) aggrid(iris) |>    ag_col_def(columns = Species,menuTabs = list('filterMenuTab'))

title: Examples
text: Center header: Set content content center:
code: aggrid(iris) |>    ag_col_group(columns = starts_with("Sepal"),headerName = "Sepal") aggrid(iris) |>    ag_col_group(columns = starts_with("Sepal"),headerName = "Sepal",headerClass = "ag-header-center") |>    ag_col_group(columns = starts_with("Petal"),headerName = "Petal",headerClass = "ag-header-center") aggrid(iris) |>    ag_col_group(columns = starts_with("Sepal"),headerName = "Sepal",headerClass = "ag-header-center") |>    ag_col_group(columns = starts_with("Petal"),headerName = "Petal",headerClass = "ag-header-center") |>    ag_col_def(cellStyle = list(textAlign = "center"),headerClass = 'ag-header-center')

title: Examples
text: Default statusBar, can set FALSE use ag_gridOptions():

title: Examples
text: Custom Side bar:
code: aggrid(iris) |>    ag_gridOptions(sideBar = TRUE) aggrid(iris) |>    ag_gridOptions(sideBar = list(     toolPanels = list(       list(         id = 'columns',         labelDefault = 'Columns',         labelKey = 'columns',         iconKey = 'columns',         toolPanel = 'agColumnsToolPanel'       )     )   ))

title: Intro to use aggrid
text: big data, e.g. millions rows,use server model. Although code can used render within 5~6s, operations sorting become slowly.server model work shiny.
code: purrr::map_dfr(seq_len(10000), ~iris) |>      aggrid() library(shiny)  ui <- fluidPage(   aggridOutput("test") )  server <- function(input, output, session) {   output$test <- renderAggrid({     purrr::map_dfr(seq_len(10000), ~iris) |>        aggrid(server = T)   })   observe({     print(input$test_rows_selected)   }) }  shinyApp(ui, server)

title: Authors and Citation
text: Liripo. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Liripo (2023). aggrid: Html widget interface ag-grid library. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://liripo.github.io/aggrid/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {aggrid: Html widget interface the ag-grid library},   author = {{Liripo}},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://liripo.github.io/aggrid/}, }

what: Html widget interface the ag-grid library

title: Html widget interface the ag-grid library
text: can also choose install development version aggrid GitHub:

title: Html widget interface the ag-grid library
Html widget interface the ag-grid library
Html widget interface the ag-grid library
Html widget interface the ag-grid library
text: big data, e.g. millions rows,use server model. Although code can used render within 5~6s, operations sorting become slowly. best use server model, work shiny.
code: purrr::map_dfr(seq_len(10000), ~iris) |>      aggrid() library(shiny)  ui <- fluidPage(   aggridOutput("test") )  server <- function(input, output, session) {   output$test <- renderAggrid({     purrr::map_dfr(seq_len(10000), ~iris) |>        aggrid(server = T)   })   observe({     print(input$test_rows_selected)   }) }  shinyApp(ui, server)

title: Column Definitions — ag_col_def
text: best directly view original document, please see https://www.ag-grid.com/javascript-data-grid/column-properties/.

title: Column Definitions — ag_col_def
code: ag_col_def(   x,   columns = NULL,   field = NULL,   colId = NULL,   type = NULL,   cellDataType = NULL,   valueGetter = NULL,   valueFormatter = NULL,   refData = NULL,   keyCreator = NULL,   equals = NULL,   checkboxSelection = NULL,   showDisabledCheckboxes = NULL,   toolPanelClass = NULL,   suppressColumnsToolPanel = NULL,   columnGroupShow = NULL,   icons = NULL,   suppressNavigable = NULL,   suppressKeyboardEvent = NULL,   suppressPaste = NULL,   suppressFillHandle = NULL,   ... )

title: Column Definitions — ag_col_def
text: x aggrid Object columns Specify column modify, Default columns. field field row object get cell's data .  Deep references row object supported via dot notation, .e 'address.firstLine'. colId unique ID give column. optional. missing, ID default field.   field colId missing, unique ID generated.   ID used identify column API sorting, filtering etc. type comma separated string array strings containing ColumnType keys can used template column.  helps reduce duplication properties lot common column properties. cellDataType data type cell values column.  Can either infer data type row data (true - default behaviour),  define specific data type (string), data type (false).    setting specific data type (string value),  can either one pre-defined data types  'text', 'number',  'boolean',  'date',  'dateString'  'object',  custom data type defined dataTypeDefinitions grid option.     Data type inference works Client-Side Row Model, requires non-null data.  also work valueGetter, valueParser refData properties defined,  column sparkline. valueGetter Function expression. Gets value data display. valueFormatter function expression format value, return string. used CSV export copy clipboard, UI cell rendering. refData Provided reference data map used map column values respective value map. keyCreator Function return string key value.  string used grouping, Set filtering, searching within cell editor dropdowns.  filtering searching string exposed user, make sure return human-readable value. equals Custom comparator values, used renderer know values changed. Cells whose values changed get refreshed.  default grid uses === work use cases. checkboxSelection Set true (return true function) render selection checkbox column. showDisabledCheckboxes Set true display disabled checkbox row selectable checkboxes enabled. toolPanelClass CSS class use tool panel cell. Can string, array strings, function. suppressColumnsToolPanel Set true want column group appear Columns Tool Panel. columnGroupShow Whether show column group open / closed. set column always displayed part group. icons Icons use inside column instead grid's default icons. Leave undefined use defaults. suppressNavigable Set true column navigable (.e. tabbed ), otherwise false.  Can also callback function different rows navigable. suppressKeyboardEvent Allows user suppress certain keyboard events grid cell. suppressPaste Pasting default long cells editable (non-editable cells modified, even paste operation).  Set true turn paste operations . suppressFillHandle Set true prevent fillHandle rendered cell belongs column. ... please see https://www.ag-grid.com/javascript-data-grid/column-properties/.

title: Columns: Filter — ag_col_filter
text: x aggrid Object columns Specify column modify, Default columns. filter Filter component use column. Set true use default filter. Set name Provided Filter set IFilterComp.See: Column Filters filterParams Params passed filter component specified filter. filterValueGetter Function expression. Gets value filtering purposes.details getQuickFilterText function tell grid Quick Filter text use column want use default (calling toString value). details floatingFilter Whether display floating filter column. floatingFilterComponent custom component used rendering floating filter.  none specified default AG Grid used. floatingFilterComponentParams Params passed floatingFilterComponent. suppressFiltersToolPanel Set true want column (filter) group (filter group) appear Filters Tool Panel.

title: Columns: Header — ag_col_header
text: x aggrid Object columns Specify column modify, Default columns. headerName name render column header. specified field specified, field name used header name. headerValueGetter Function expression. Gets value display header.details headerTooltip Tooltip column header headerClass CSS class use header cell. Can string, array strings, function. details headerComponent custom header group component used rendering component header. none specified default AG Grid used.See: Header Component headerComponentParams parameters passed headerComponent. wrapHeaderText enabled column header names long column width wrap onto next line. Default false autoHeaderHeight enabled column header row automatically adjust height accommodate size header cell.  can useful using headerComponent long header names conjunction wrapHeaderText. menuTabs Set array containing zero, one many following options: 'filterMenuTab' | 'generalMenuTab' | 'columnsMenuTab'.  used figure menu tabs present order tabs shown. columnsMenuParams Params used change behaviour appearance Columns Menu tab. details suppressMenu Set true menu shown column header. suppressHeaderKeyboardEvent Suppress grid taking action relevant keyboard event header focused. details headerCheckboxSelection true callback returns true, 'select ' checkbox put header. details headerCheckboxSelectionFilteredOnly true, header checkbox selection select filtered items. headerCheckboxSelectionCurrentPageOnly true, header checkbox selection select nodes current page.

title: Custom columns sort — ag_col_sort
text: x aggrid Object columns Specify column modify, Default columns. sortable Set true allow sorting column. sort sorting default, set . Set asc desc. details initialSort sort, except applied creating new column. applied updating column definitions. details sortIndex sorting one column default, specifies order sorting applied. initialSortIndex sortIndex, except applied creating new column. applied updating column definitions. sortingOrder Array defining order sorting occurs (sorting enabled). array following order 'asc','desc',null. comparator Override default sorting order providing custom sort comparator.  valueA, valueB values compare.  nodeA,  nodeB corresponding RowNodes. Useful additional details required sort.  isDescending - true sort direction desc. used inverting return value grid already applies asc desc ordering. unSortIcon Set true want unsorted icon shown sort applied column.

title: Columns: Spanning — ag_col_span
code: ag_col_span(x, columns = NULL, colSpan = NULL, rowSpan = NULL)

title: Columns: Spanning — ag_col_span
text: x aggrid Object columns Specify column modify, Default columns. colSpan default, cell take width one column. can change behaviour allow cells span multiple columns. rowSpan default, cell take height one row. can change behaviour allow cells span multiple rows.

title: Custom columns cell tooltip — ag_col_tooltip

title: Custom columns cell tooltip — ag_col_tooltip
code: ag_col_tooltip(   x,   columns = NULL,   tooltipField = NULL,   tooltipValueGetter = NULL,   tooltipComponent = NULL,   tooltipComponentParams = NULL )

title: Custom columns cell tooltip — ag_col_tooltip
text: x aggrid Object columns Specify column modify, Default columns. tooltipField field tooltip apply cell. tooltipValueGetter Callback return string use tooltip, tooltipField takes precedence set. using custom tooltipComponent may return custom value passed tooltip component. tooltipComponent Provide tooltip component column. params used configure tooltipComponent.

title: Custom colums width — ag_col_width
text: message: https://www.ag-grid.com/javascript-data-grid/column-properties/#reference-width

title: Custom colums width — ag_col_width
code: ag_col_width(   x,   columns = NULL,   width = NULL,   initialWidth = NULL,   minWidth = NULL,   maxWidth = NULL,   flex = NULL,   initialFlex = NULL,   resizable = NULL,   suppressSizeToFit = NULL,   suppressAutoSize = NULL )

title: Custom colums width — ag_col_width
text: x aggrid Object columns Specify column modify, Default columns. width Initial width pixels cell. initialWidth width, except applied creating new column. applied updating column definitions. minWidth Minimum width pixels cell. maxWidth Maximum width pixels cell. flex Used instead width goal fill remaining empty space grid. initialFlex flex, except applied creating new column. applied updating column definitions. resizable Set true allow column resized. suppressSizeToFit Set true want column's width fixed 'size fit' operations. suppressAutoSize Set true want column auto-resizable double clicking edge.

title: Shiny bindings for aggrid — aggrid-shiny
code: aggridOutput(outputId, width = "100%", height = "500px")  renderAggrid(expr, env = parent.frame(), quoted = FALSE)

title: Shiny bindings for aggrid — aggrid-shiny
text: outputId output variable read width, height Must valid CSS unit (like '100%', '400px', 'auto') number, coerced string 'px' appended. expr expression generates aggrid env environment evaluate expr. quoted expr quoted expression (quote())? useful want save expression variable.

text: function creates HTML widget display matrix data frame using ag-grid.

title: Create a HTML widget using the ag-grid library — aggrid
code: aggrid(   data,   rowSelection = c("multiple", "single", "none"),   checkboxSelection = FALSE,   pagination = FALSE,   paginationPageSize = 10,   domLayout = NULL,   ...,   theme = "ag-theme-balham",   community = FALSE,   use_cdn = FALSE,   server = FALSE,   width = NULL,   height = NULL,   elementId = NULL )

title: Create a HTML widget using the ag-grid library — aggrid
text: data data frame matrix. rowSelection three options：multiple,single,none. checkboxSelection Enable checkbox first column? pagination Enable pagination allows? paginationPageSize default size 10. ... options, please see https://www.ag-grid.com/javascript-data-grid/grid-options theme Specify theme. Default ag-theme-balham. please see https://www.ag-grid.com/example/?theme=ag-theme-alpine community Enable use community? use_cdn Depends resource use cdn? server server model width, height Width/Height pixels (optional, defaults automatic sizing) elementId id widget (random string default).
